word: Do I not have the right

str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Neuter 1st Person Plural
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
